metadata.Title: CVE-2022-36319 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: When combining CSS properties for overflow and transform, the mouse cursorcould interact with different coordinates than displayed. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 102.1, Firefox ESR < 91.12, Firefox <103, Thunderbird < 102.1, and Thunderbird < 91.12.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
